name: Potato In Tomato Curry
description: Potato in tomato curry. A quick and easy dinner recipe for weeknights, serve with rice and rot/chapati. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon Serrano chili pepper ((or to taste) chopped)
1/2 teaspoon raw sugar or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan, add a teaspoon oil and heat on medium low heat for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan, add a teaspoon oil and heat on medium low heat for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mustard seeds and wait for them to sputter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the mustard seeds and wait for them to sputter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida and curry leaves and mix
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida and curry leaves and mix

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the coriander, cumin seeds, turmeric, garlic, ginger and chili and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the coriander, cumin seeds, turmeric, garlic, ginger and chili and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tomatoes, salt and sugar and cook on medium low heat for 10-15 minutes, until the tomatoes are all mixed and mashed up. Adjust salt and sugar for sweet and sour taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tomatoes, salt and sugar and cook on medium low heat for 10-15 minutes, until the tomatoes are all mixed and mashed up. Adjust salt and sugar for sweet and sour taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped boiled potato and water and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped boiled potato and water and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro and some Pooris/Rotis or Rice!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro and some Pooris/Rotis or Rice!

keywords: jamaican vegetable curry, quick curry recipe, weeknight meal
